skill_e.tooltip: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.

skill_i.tooltip: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.

skill_q.tooltip: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.

skill_r.tooltip: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.

skill_w.tooltip: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
